thread.title: Djokovic wins 6th China Open in 45th Nadal clash (Beijing Municipal Government)
thread.title_full: Djokovic wins 6th China Open in 45th Nadal clash (Beijing Municipal Government) - Worldnews.com

author: wn.com
title: Djokovic wins 6th China Open in 45th Nadal clash (Beijing Municipal Government)
text: ( Source : Beijing Municipal Government ) Novak Djokovic of Serbia poses with his trophy during the award ceremony after winning the men's singles final match against Rafa Nadal of Spain at the China Open Tennis Tournament in Beijing, China ,
